entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -19.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
